author: Valentino Bolognese
description: This deep reddy-brown bittersweet drink is based upon sweet almond syrup balancing bitter notes from the Angostura and lime tartness. With a whole shot of Angostura this cocktail is most unusual.
name: Trinidad Especial
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
